programme.desc: Steve Aoki comes in to MTV HQ to talk about the music videos that have made him into the successful artist he is today! What was the first video he ever saw and who's his biggest inspiration?

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2023
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2023!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep23
programme.desc: Wheres The Party? / The Noisiest Night - When Marcus loses an invitation to a birthday party and doesnt know where it will take place, the Dew Drops set out to find the location and get Marcus to the party on time. / When Harper cant sleep because of a strange noise in her room, the Dews must figure out the source.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep2
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep69
programme.desc: Tears In The Drain - When Detective King Julien searches for a missing Butterfish he notices lemurs acting strange all around and realizes he has a serious mystery on his hands so he must get the Mystery Solving Team back together

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep70
programme.desc: Squad Goals - When King Juliens consultant tells him that his squad is losing their cool King Julien decides to get a whole new crew

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep43
programme.desc: Lucky and the Escape Artist - Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky borrows Snips for a day to see what its like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep44
programme.desc: Lucky and the Thin Ice - The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep11
programme.desc: Salty and Sweet / Cruz Blues - Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isnt good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep21
programme.desc: The Fly-A-Long / Unburied Treasure - When the Dews' Glitter Guide, Willow comes to check on the Dews progress, they feel like theyre failing to impress her, until Lola gets locked out of the apartment during a game of Hide-and-Seek and Dews work together to get her back inside. / When the Dew Drops discover a time capsule in the park, they set out to find the mystery owner.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep46
programme.desc: Voice Fail Part 1 & 2 - When Grug wakes up without a voice, he and Ugga go on the hunt to find his voice, while Eep, Thunk, and Gran stay behind. But when the Valleyites come to Eep with questions for Grug, she takes this opportunity to be a leader by pretending to have a conversation with Grug in their cave

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep47
programme.desc: Punch Thunk Love / Nay Boors - When Eep and the others try to intervene with Thunk and Blurg's first date, they decide to run away so they can live happily ever after; Snoot and Ugga race each other to get to the Doomsday Skunkguin but are forced to put their differences aside once the weirder animals come out to hunt them down

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep51
programme.desc: The Business Boss: Back in Baby - After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep52
programme.desc: The Stroll - Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep25
programme.desc: Coronation of the Iron Goddess - When things don't quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep26
programme.desc: The Invincible Armour - Po and the Kids are put to the ultimate test, and must use all their knowledge and skills in order to defeat The White Bone Demon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier's Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Trolls fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep40
programme.desc: The Fast and the Friendliest / Much Achoo About Nothing - Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protg./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.desc: Angerdome / Tush Twins - Tip battles an alien as angry as she is at the Boov's Angerspringa festival./Sharzod and Lucy become besties and call themselves the Tush Twins.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep12
programme.desc: Medieval Fest/ John Sutter - Sherman lets Mr. Hobson ride Captain Cools to beat Joan of Arc in a live joust competition; John Sutter creates a pig rush to discover the gold rush.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep37
programme.desc: The Voltron Show! - With the Galra empire in upheaval Team Voltron realizes that now is the time to unite the galaxy and bring the fight to Zarkon

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep63
programme.desc: Remember Me Not - An adorable orphan named Li'l Pequena is revealed to actually be a changeling who altered the townspeople's memories and convinced them that she's been there all along

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep37
programme.desc: The Day Mel Fell/Burns Ex Boo - Mel Shellman gets fired and crashes with the FAST crew, but he's so annoying they try to get him rehired; An old flame shows up, making Chet jealous.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep73
programme.desc: Violet's Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep21
programme.desc: The Case Of The Snow Mystery - It's Christmas Day and Noddy's got a new snowglobe. He wishes it would snow outside but Big Ears tells him that it has never snowed in Toyland. Noddy uses all his investigating skills to works out that by combining Smartysaurus glitter experiment with Deltoid's soccer ball and using Revs' lights, he can light up the DareDale caves with beautiful snowflake images just like the inside of his snowglove. If anyone can make it snow in Toyland, Noddy can! Hurrah!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep74
programme.desc: Pumpkin Pie For Diggly - Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep22
programme.desc: The Case Of The Wonky Toys - All the toys in Toyland are visiting Fuse's workshop for a toy check but something is wrong! Toys are fine before the check and wonky after! Noddy investigates why toys are going wonky so that he can help them return to normal quickly. With the help of his wwwbook and following all the clues Noddy works out that Fuse has given himself a robot upgrade to help him do the toy checks quickly but he installed it incorrectly. That's why he's been making the toys go wonky! Noddy helps Fuse uninstall the upgrade and soon everyone is back to normal. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep21
programme.desc: Mum's The Word - Christine (Big Chris' mum) is visiting Silver hatch. As is Mamma Mia serious competition ensues!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep22
programme.desc: How The Hatch Was Won - Tin Top is feeling homesick so Big Chris tries to cheer him up. But who could that pesky varmint causing trouble on the track be?!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep21
programme.desc: Why Rhino Charges - You see there was a time when Rhino didn't charge and he couldn't see very well at all. Poor old Rhino really wanted to be invited to the Dance of the Horns up on the plains with Buffalo and all the other horned animals. But Rhino didn't have a horn, so he wasn't allowed. The Monkeys decide to help Rhino and make him a horn from a piece of old wood. But when Rhino wakes up he doesn't know what it is. Aargh! Thing on the end of my nose! CHAAaarge!' And that's Why Rhino Charges. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep22
programme.desc: Why Caterpillar Is Never In A Hurry - You see Caterpillar was never in a hurry. When all the animals were racing around Tinga Tinga getting ready for the Best-dressed parade, Caterpillar was happy to sit in a tree and munch on leaves saying Po-le, po-le, slowly, slowly, good things come to those who wait'. Then one day the rains come and Caterpillar disappears into a cocoon. What's happening?' questions Elephant. Wait and see' says Tortoise wisely Wait and See'. Then Caterpillar transforms into the most beautiful butterfly ever!... But who wins the Best-dressed parade? Tales from Africa

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep11
programme.desc: Tanaka's Moving Castle / Zenko Don't Go - Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep3
programme.desc: Old Dog, New Tricks \ Snoozie-Hullabaloozie - Tag chooses to pair up with her Grandpaw for the Barker Family Talent Show, and together, they search for their winning talent. \ Tag is surprised to learn that today is the Pawston Snoozie-a-Hullabaloozie. With everything shut down for the day, Tag and Scooch take the opportunity to play all over town, while trying not to wake up other dogs.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep55
programme.desc: Caballo Sin Cabeza - When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep55
programme.desc: Something Rotten On Beserker Island - When the riders receive an invitation to Berserker Island for Gustav's apprenticeship graduation, they arrive to find Savage trying to take over Dagur's throne

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep55
programme.desc: Iron Ted Weekend - King Julien and team discover a trapped Crimson and must team up to defeat a beast; Mort tries to rally his fellow lemurs but they are losing hope

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep19
programme.desc: Stuff / Campout - When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didnt go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep24
programme.desc: Escape The Backpack / Play Date - While helping Lola pack for her first day of camp, the Dews get stuck inside her backpack! Using the random items inside, the Dews get crafty in their attempt to break out. / When Eden and Phoebe join Harper and Marcus for a playdate, the Dews disagree on what activity their kids should do, ultimately learning that there are lots of ways to play!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep3
programme.desc: Boo to You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep1
programme.desc: Somewhere / Over the Rainbow - Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family hes a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep25
programme.desc: Flying High / Nest Sweet Nest - Marcus makes a Dew Drop-sized hot-air balloon for Phoebe and the Dews have a blast helping their kids from above, including secretly guiding Lola back to her family, before she accidentally follows Hip-Hop the frog out of the park. / Phoebe makes a pair of glasses for Bob the bird, but when seeing things clearly for the first time gets him lost, the Dews help Bob find his nest before his family arrives for a visit.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep3
programme.desc: Boo to You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.desc: One More Cup, Part 2 - King Julien discovers tea which becomes a huge hit throughout the kingdom but when Karls brother Bruce invites him to his coffee corporation trouble start to brew

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep72
programme.desc: There Will Be Juice - When a crate of PURE ORGANIC IMPOSSIBLY SAFE ORGANIC NUTRIENTS washes onto shore King Julien accidentally overfeeds the crops creating a giant mango that tries to take over the world

programme.desc: Lucky and the Ray of Sunshine - The PALs agree to work on Grayson's ranch to get out of trouble, but he gets more help than he bargained for

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep46
programme.desc: Lucky and the Double-Dad Dare - Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.desc: Pet Sitters / Narwhalicorn Day - Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep22
programme.desc: Tooth on the Loose / That Thing You Dew - When Phoebe convinces the Tooth Fairy to visit before Marcus has actually lost his tooth, the Dew Drops do everything in their power to make sure the tooth is out before she arrives! / The Dews decide to hold a concert in the park for their animal friends, but cant find the time to practice.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep48
programme.desc: Caverns And Creepers / Rad Teacher - When Eep is kicked out of Thunk's new imaginary role-playing adventure game she decides to play her own, real version of the game; Fed up with Squawk's mean teaching style, Eep has Grug fire him and replace him with Rad, the quintessential young, cool teacher

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep49
programme.desc: Grugs First Chance / Furry Road - Tired of settling disputes between Valleyites, Grug invents Chance, a two-sided rock that can be flipped to determine all decisions in the Valley; In a nature documentary-style, Thunk tells the story of Beary, a peaceful Thunk-like cub that struggles to fit into a violent bear owl culture

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who's There?/Tour Guide of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Novas toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep42
programme.desc: Scrapbookmobile / Troll Rangers - When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who's There?/Tour Guide of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep12
programme.desc: Sitting On Babies / Best Frenemies - Things go very wrong when Tip and Oh watch the Gorg babies at a cheese-themed playland/Captain Smek pretends to be Oh's friend just to ruin his day.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep13
programme.desc: Outbreak/ Ancient Greek Games - Sherman accidentally finds the cure for a prehistoric bird flu turning everyone blue; Zeus's team of titans face off against a gawky geek squad.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep38
programme.desc: Begin The Blitz - With Zarkon consumed by his hunt for Lotor, Voltron gathers their coalition and prepares to strike in hopes of demolishing the evil Empire

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep64
programme.desc: Through Caverns Measureless - When the gang chases Li'l Pequena into the portal, everyone but Puss gets super-powers and must join forces with a sorceress to overthrow the Blind King

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep38
programme.desc: Tough As Snails/Conspiracy - Whiplash takes on the toughest creature around in a MMA-style fight; When the FAST crew is abducted, Skidmark and his conspiracy club get on the case.

programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep144
programme.desc: The Paperplane Race - Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep145
programme.desc: Give-Away Day - Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep323
programme.desc: Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case! / Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe - Paddington and his friends set out to help PC Wells solve the case of the missing Windsor Ruby. // Thanks to Aunt Lucy's Special recipe the Browns set up a takeaway business from their home, but it's hard work!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep306
programme.desc: Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor - Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep606
programme.desc: Sparkle's Racing Badge - It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Bad Bird Crew / Pups Save a Soapbox Derby - Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock. // Adventure Bay is holding a kids only soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep711
programme.desc: Pups Save the Skydivers / Pups Save the Cupcakes - Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. It's Paw Patrol to the rescue! // Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder, the Paw Patrol dives in to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Pups Save Ryder's Robot - When Ryders Robot Pup breaks and starts going wild around Adventure Bay, it takes the whole Paw Patrol to help Ryder find it.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Alebrije Adventure / Let's Get A Paleta - Ale the Alebrije asks Dora for her help! The Alebrije tree is wilting, so it's up to Dora to find its rainbow water. // On a super hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! Dora goes to rescue her and get paletas for everyone.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Sick as a Sharkdog - When Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious cold, Max knows Dad will be able to help him feel better. But things go haywire when the aquarium's robot doctor takes over the examination!

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep209
programme.desc: The Sharkdog Scoop - When Mom is assigned to investigate Sharkdog's wild side for the news, she realizes there's nothing scary about Max's best friend.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep201
programme.desc: The Sharkdog Days of Summer - Max and Sharkdog want to enjoy the last day of summer, but first, they have to deal with the mess they left at home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Summer Camp I / Summer Camp II - Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. // The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thse", a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep204
programme.desc: Dreams And Illusions / Dreaming Apprentices - While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep613

programme.desc: Secret Underworlds of the Soviet Union: Georgia - Bunkers, tunnels, former torture chambers: Georgia is home to secret underworlds, built during the Soviet era. programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep910AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep607BattlegroundsLAWMMAUnbreakableBonfimWarriorCodeCalvinKattar
programme.desc: We visit legendary coach Ray Longo in Long Island to get a better look at the history of LAW MMA and the champions hes produced. UFC featherweight Calvin Kattar shares his keys to success in the Octagon in this edition of Warrior Code.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 CURLING SHOTS

programme.desc: At UFC 288 bad blood boils over as bantamweight champ Aljamain Sterling and Henry Cejudo settle their score in the main event. Plus, active welterweights Gilrbert Burns and Belal Muhammad battle it out. See the entire main card, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep11
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep911TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured the first title defense of newly crowned light heavyweight champion Glover Teixeira against surging contender Jiri Prochazka. See both men train and prepare for their battle for the belt in Singapore.

programme.title: MotoGP - Gran Premio Red Bull di San Marino e della Riviera di Rimini Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP - Gran Premio Red Bull di San Marino e della Riviera di Rimini Highlights - There are at least fifteen riders across all three classes who call the circuit their home, starting with the nine-time World Champion Valentino Rossi. Now, there are even some of the youngest riders on the grid who travel no more than a handful of kilometres to the circuit. Thats all thanks to the track becoming a reference point for training and testing throughout the year for riders.

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women - Rd6 - GS Caltex VS AI Peppers EpRd6
programme.desc: GS Caltex VS AI Peppers - The 20th season of the KOVO V-League Women sees reigning champions EX Hi-pass defend their title against six fellow professional volleyball teams for the coveted championship in South Korea.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Burns vs. Brady
programme.desc: Prelims - Welterweight contenders Gilbert Burns and Sean Brady square off at UFC APEX on September 8 for a summer showdown that is expected to shake up the Top 10 at 170 pounds. A world-class grappler with dynamite in his hands, Brazils Burns is on a mission to get back to a world title shot, but standing in his way in the UFC Fight Night main event is the Philadelphia tough Brady, a 16-1 rising star who is fresh off a Performance of the Night submission of Kelvin Gastelum.
